dublin_core.dcvalue: Despite their abundant spread mobile phones are suspected by a major share of the population to cause adverse effects on health and welfare The ear as the sense organ next to the individual device has rarely been investigated for short term effects in this regard In a previous article we could not prove any impact on the vestibular part of the inner ear Our present examinations are concerned with the question whether mobile phone emissions could affect cochlear or auditory brain stem functions
Otolaryngology--head and neck surgery : official journal of American Academy of Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery
Can mobile phone emissions affect auditory functions of cochlea or brain stem?
